description:
For time series analysis, everyone's talking about ARIMA or Holt-Winters. But there's other models which could also break down a seasonal series into trend, seasonality and noise. We will use an open source Python library called Seasonal to analyse B2B worldwide travel data.

Slides: /redirect?event=video_description&redir_token=TE74_IZ1LRBkW01yf83w4Afka6V8MTUzMjc1ODc2OEAxNTMyNjcyMzY4&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.slideshare.net%2FCheukTingHo%2Fpydata-amsterdam-2018-time-series-analysis-with-seasonal-data-99093353&v=ZR9aAZZEhQo
title: Case Study in Travel Business - Time Series Analysis with Seasonal Data - Cheuk Ting Ho
